BackstoryDef.title: Presidential Prodigy
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born into a high-pressure political dynasty, Curtis was trained from a young age to debate, command, and lead. He learned how to keep a cool head under fire—literally and figuratively.

BackstoryDef.title: President of the United States of Fucking America
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As Earth's top authority, Curtis dealt with alien invasions, rogue scientists, and political betrayal. Despite the madness, he remained composed and effective—until the world got too weird even for him.

BackstoryDef.title: Mad Science Prodigy
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Rick was building death rays before he could walk. School was for Mortys. He learned to question everything—especially authority.

BackstoryDef.title: Interdimensional Scientist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Inventor, destroyer, and the galaxy’s worst grandpa. Rick’s adventures left him with a portal gun, a flask, and a total disregard for safety protocols. Wubba lubba dub dub!

BackstoryDef.title: Awkward Teen
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Morty just wanted a normal life, but instead got dragged into Rick’s chaos. He learned to run fast and question reality.

BackstoryDef.title: Reluctant Adventurer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After a thousand adventures, Morty’s trauma is only matched by his survival instincts. “Aw jeez, Rick!”

BackstoryDef.title: Popular Kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Summer was always trying to be cool, but ended up fighting aliens with her grandpa. She learned to adapt—and sass back.

BackstoryDef.title: Dimension Hopper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Summer’s adventures made her tough and sarcastic. She’s seen more weird stuff than most RimWorlders. “Move over, Morty!”

BackstoryDef.title: Horse Girl
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Beth loved horses and science, but mostly horses. She dreamed of being a real vet, not just a clone. Or is she?

BackstoryDef.title: Horse Surgeon
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Beth became a horse surgeon, but her real specialty is existential crisis. “I’m not a clone, right?”

BackstoryDef.title: Unremarkable Kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Jerry was always picked last. He tried his best, but his best was... Jerry.

BackstoryDef.title: Unemployed Dad
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Jerry’s greatest skill is mediocrity. He’s survived this long by being forgettable. “I am the father!”
